title: "HBKU college initiates Arabic Big Data and AI workshop"
excerpt: "The College of Humanities and Social Sciences (CHSS) at Hamad Bin Khalifa University (HBKU), in collaboration with Qatar National Research Fund (QNRF) and Qatar National Library (QNL), hosted the inaugural International Workshop on Arabic Big Data and AI (IWABigDAI) on May 11 and 12."
